descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=401164HORIZON.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/401164HORIZON.jpg[/img][/url]

ENBseries by Manigoldo
ENBseries created by Boris Vorontsov @ www.enbdev.com
ENBSERIES VERSION: TES Skyrim 0.157

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=138271Install.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/138271Install.jpg[/img][/url]

HorizonENB for CLARALUX by MGE http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17605 and ELFX by Anamorfus http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043
Extract the downloaded mod to your Skyrim directory.
Download the source files: http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0157.htm , copy over only the d3d9.dll and place in your skyrim directory.
For active Ambient Occlusion : go to your Nvidia Panel \"or\" EnableAmbientOcclusion=true .
For active or desactive Sweet FX press : Pause Attn
If the Sharpening is too high, go on SweetFX_settings.txt and LumaSharpen settings. Try 1.50 or 1.00 on this line #define sharp_strength 2.00.

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=983701Overview.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/983701Overview.jpg[/img][/url]
